item.title: Trump energy secretary says no nuclear explosions for now
item.description: After the president called for resuming nuclear testing “immediately,” the official said the administration is planning only system tests.

item.title: Uncertainty hits after vulnerable Americans wake up to a SNAP freeze
item.description: Nonprofit groups plan to work extra hours to get food out to vulnerable residents, and local community members are also stepping up.
